text:
Visual Story

Thousands of American service personnel are missing from previous conflicts and the Defense POW/MIA Agency remains relentless in its mission to provide the fullest possible accounting to their families and the nation, until they’re home.
title: U.S. Department of War

meta_data.description: The Department of War is America's largest government agency. Our mission is to provide the military forces needed to deter war and ensure our nation's security.
meta_data.keywords: War Department, Department of War, DoW, DOW, Secretary, Deputy Secretary, Joint Chief, United States, Military, Government, Pentagon, Secretary of War, Deputy Secretary of War

og.title: U.S. Department of War
og.description: The Department of War is America's largest government agency. With our military tracing its roots back to pre-Revolutionary times, the department has grown and evolved with our nation.
